FUNCTION ads_select_row( i_ads_ID   IN  acl_aet_detailed_states.ID%TYPE
                       , o_rt_ads   OUT acl_aet_detailed_states%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION ads_select_row_uk_1( i_ads_DSD_ID   IN  acl_aet_detailed_states.DSD_ID%TYPE
                            , i_ads_AET_ID   IN  acl_aet_detailed_states.AET_ID%TYPE
                            , o_rt_ads  OUT acl_aet_detailed_states%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

                           , o_rt_ads   OUT acl_aet_detailed_states%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

                                , i_ads_AET_ID   IN  acl_aet_detailed_states.AET_ID%TYPE
                                , o_rt_ads  OUT acl_aet_detailed_states%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

PROCEDURE ads_lock_row( i_ads_ID   IN  acl_aet_detailed_states.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE ads_lock_row_nowait( i_ads_ID   IN  acl_aet_detailed_states.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE ads_insert_row ( io_rt_ads  IN OUT acl_aet_detailed_states%ROWTYPE )
;

FUNCTION ads_update_row( i_ads_ID   IN     acl_aet_detailed_states.ID%TYPE
                       , io_rt_ads  IN OUT acl_aet_detailed_states%ROWTYPE )
RETURN NUMBER

RETURN BOOLEAN
;

RETURN acl_aet_detailed_states.ID%TYPE
;


END acl_ads_tapi_pck;

package body acl_ads_tapi_pck

function ads_select_row( i_ads_id   in  acl_aet_detailed_states.id%type
                       , o_rt_ads   out acl_aet_detailed_states%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ads_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_ads ( i_ads_id   in  acl_aet_detailed_states.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from acl_aet_detailed_states ads
            where ads.id = i_ads_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_ads( i_ads_id => i_ads_id );
         fetch c_ads into o_rt_ads;
         l_found := c_ads%found;
         close c_ads;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_ads%isopen
         then
            close c_ads;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ads_select_row;

function ads_select_row_uk_1( i_ads_dsd_id   in  acl_aet_detailed_states.dsd_id%type
                            , i_ads_aet_id   in  acl_aet_detailed_states.aet_id%type
                            , o_rt_ads  out acl_aet_detailed_states%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ads_select_row_uk_1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_ads ( i_ads_dsd_id   in  acl_aet_detailed_states.dsd_id%type
                   , i_ads_aet_id   in  acl_aet_detailed_states.aet_id%type )
      is
         select *
           from acl_aet_detailed_states ads
          where ads.dsd_id = i_ads_dsd_id 
            and ads.aet_id = i_ads_aet_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_ads(i_ads_dsd_id => i_ads_dsd_id, i_ads_aet_id => i_ads_aet_id);
         fetch c_ads into o_rt_ads;
         l_found := c_ads%found;
         close c_ads;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
   when others
    then
      if c_ads%isopen
      then
         close c_ads;
      end if;
      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ads_select_row_uk_1;

function ads_select_row_upd( i_ads_id   in  acl_aet_detailed_states.id%type
                           , o_rt_ads   out acl_aet_detailed_states%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ads_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_ads ( i_ads_id   in  acl_aet_detailed_states.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from acl_aet_detailed_states ads
            where ads.id = i_ads_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_ads( i_ads_id => i_ads_id );
   fetch c_ads into o_rt_ads;
   l_found := c_ads%found;
   close c_ads;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_ads%isopen
      then
         close c_ads;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end ads_select_row_upd;

function ads_select_row_upd_uk_1( i_ads_dsd_id   in  acl_aet_detailed_states.dsd_id%type
                                , i_ads_aet_id   in  acl_aet_detailed_states.aet_id%type
                                , o_rt_ads  out acl_aet_detailed_states%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ads_select_row_upd_uk_1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   begin
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      
      l_found := ads_select_row_uk_1( i_ads_dsd_id   =>  i_ads_dsd_id
                                    , i_ads_aet_id   =>  i_ads_aet_id
                                    , o_rt_ads => o_rt_ads );
      if l_found
      then
         
         l_found := ads_select_row_upd( i_ads_id => o_rt_ads.id
                                      , o_rt_ads => o_rt_ads );
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);
   end;
end ads_select_row_upd_uk_1;

procedure ads_lock_row( i_ads_id   in  acl_aet_detailed_states.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ads_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_ads ( i_ads_id   in  acl_aet_detailed_states.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from acl_aet_detailed_states ads
              where ads.id = i_ads_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_ads_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                ads_lock_row_nowait( i_ads_id => i_ads_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_ads( i_ads_id => i_ads_id );
                  close c_ads;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_ads%isopen
         then
            close c_ads;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ads_lock_row;

procedure ads_lock_row_nowait( i_ads_id   in  acl_aet_detailed_states.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ads_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_ads ( i_ads_id   in  acl_aet_detailed_states.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from acl_aet_detailed_states ads
               where ads.id = i_ads_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_ads_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_ads( i_ads_id => i_ads_id );

            close c_ads;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_ads%isopen
        then
           close c_ads;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_ads_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end ads_lock_row_nowait;

function ads_perform_update( i_ads_id   in     acl_aet_detailed_states.id%type
                           , io_rt_ads  in out acl_aet_detailed_states%rowtype )
return number
;

function ads_perform_delete( i_ads_id   in  acl_aet_detailed_states.id%type )
return boolean
;

procedure ads_insert_row ( io_rt_ads  in out acl_aet_detailed_states%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ads_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into acl_aet_detailed_states( id
                                , dsd_id
                                , aet_id
                                , ind_status )
              values ( io_rt_ads.id
                     , io_rt_ads.dsd_id
                     , io_rt_ads.aet_id
                     , io_rt_ads.ind_status )
           returning id
                   , dsd_id
                   , aet_id
                   , ind_status
                into io_rt_ads.id
                   , io_rt_ads.dsd_id
                   , io_rt_ads.aet_id
                   , io_rt_ads.ind_status;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_ads.id||'"'
                                                             ||', DSD_ID = "'||io_rt_ads.dsd_id||'"'
                                                             ||', AET_ID = "'||io_rt_ads.aet_id||'"'
                                                             ||', IND_STATUS = "'||io_rt_ads.ind_status||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ads_insert_row;

function ads_perform_update( i_ads_id   in     acl_aet_detailed_states.id%type
                           , io_rt_ads  in out acl_aet_detailed_states%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ads_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update acl_aet_detailed_states
            set id = io_rt_ads.id
              , dsd_id = io_rt_ads.dsd_id
              , aet_id = io_rt_ads.aet_id
              , ind_status = io_rt_ads.ind_status
          where id = i_ads_id
      returning id
              , dsd_id
              , aet_id
              , ind_status
           into io_rt_ads.id
              , io_rt_ads.dsd_id
              , io_rt_ads.aet_id
              , io_rt_ads.ind_status;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_ads.id||'"'
                                                             ||', DSD_ID = "'||io_rt_ads.dsd_id||'"'
                                                             ||', AET_ID = "'||io_rt_ads.aet_id||'"'
                                                             ||', IND_STATUS = "'||io_rt_ads.ind_status||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ads_perform_update;

function ads_perform_delete( i_ads_id   in  acl_aet_detailed_states.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ads_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from acl_aet_detailed_states
          where id = i_ads_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_ads_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end ads_perform_delete;

function ads_update_row( i_ads_id   in     acl_aet_detailed_states.id%type
                       , io_rt_ads  in out acl_aet_detailed_states%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ads_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         ads_lock_row( i_ads_id   =>  i_ads_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            ads_perform_update( i_ads_id   =>  i_ads_id
                              , io_rt_ads  => io_rt_ads );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_ads.id||'"'
                                                          ||', DSD_ID = "'||io_rt_ads.dsd_id||'"'
                                                          ||', AET_ID = "'||io_rt_ads.aet_id||'"'
                                                          ||', IND_STATUS = "'||io_rt_ads.ind_status||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end ads_update_row;

function ads_delete_row( i_ads_id   in  acl_aet_detailed_states.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ads_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         ads_lock_row( i_ads_id   =>  i_ads_id );

         
         l_deleted := ads_perform_delete( i_ads_id   =>  i_ads_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_ads_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end ads_delete_row;

function ads_seq1_nextval
return acl_aet_detailed_states.id%type
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ads_seq1_nextval';
   l_ads_id  acl_aet_detailed_states.id%type;
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         select acl_ads_seq1.nextval 
           into l_ads_id
           from dual;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_ads_id;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ads_seq1_nextval;


end acl_ads_tapi_pck;
/
